headline: Some of the Biggest AI Winners of 2025 Are Data Storage Stocks
summary: Shares of several data storage providers rallied Monday, extending a surge in recent weeks. The reason? AI-driven demand that has sent tech-stock investors looking for opportunity in a range of segments that offer the potential for growth.

headline: Lindsay Corporation Announces Appointment of Jahidul H. Khandaker to Board of Directors
summary: OMAHA, Neb., September 15, 2025--Lindsay Corporation (NYSE: LNN), a leading global manufacturer and distributor of irrigation and infrastructure equipment and technology, today announced that Jahidul H. Khandaker has been appointed to its Board of Directors. headline: Western Digital (WDC) Stock Is Up, What You Need To Know
summary: Shares of leading data storage manufacturer Western Digital (NASDAQ: WDC) jumped 4.6% in the afternoon session after the company announced it is immediately increasing prices across its entire range of hard disk drives (HDDs), citing unprecedented demand.

headline: Should You Jump Into Western Digital After Its 30% Surge on AI Storage Optimism in 2025?
summary: If you have been eyeing Western Digital stock and wondering whether now is the right moment to make a move, you are definitely not alone. After all, not many stocks have managed to more than double in value over the past year, let alone deliver an astonishing 259.2% return over five years. Even in just the last month, Western Digital’s price lifted by more than 30.1%, with shorter term momentum staying positive at 4.7% in the past week. The surge is partly linked to optimism about robust...
